column2: "Na Abraham tuu kwan fi hɔ kɔr Pomu Afamu Asaase do; na ɔkɛtsenaa Kades nye Sur ntamu; na ɔkɛyɛɛ hɔho wɔ Gerar."
"Na hɔ Abraham kaa no wɔ ne yer Sara ho dɛ
column3: M'akyerɛbaa a: na Gerarhen Abimelek somae ma wɔkɛfaa Sara."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn baa Abimelek hɔ wɔ anafua adaaso mu
column5: ɔbaa a akɛfa no ntsi ayɛ owufo ara nye no; na banyin no ne yer a."

column2: "Afei Abimelek nnyae mmfaa no ho nnkaa no: na ɔsee dɛ

column4: mekyerɛ ɔnoara ɔbaa no so see dɛ
column5: Mo nua a: m'akoma mu tsewee
column6: nye me nsa ho no krɔnkrɔnyɛ mu

column5: minyim dɛ w'akoma mu tsewee mu na ayɛ yi
column6: na mo so musuoo wo mu amma aannyɛ bɔn enntsia me: dɛm ntsi na mamma annka no."

column3: fa banyin no ne yer san kɛma no; na ɔyɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi
column5: ma eenya nkwa: na sɛ ammfa no annsan amma no a

column4: na ɔkaa nsɛm yi nyinara wɔ hɔn aso mu: na nkorɔfo no hɔn akoma tuu kɛsenara."
Ebɛnadze na ayɛ hɛn yi? Na ebɛnadze mu na mayɛ bɔn etsia wo ma edze bɔn kokroko aba emi nye m'ahenman do yi? Adze a ɔnnsɛ dɛ wɔyɛ na edze ayɛ me yi."
Ampaara Nyankopɔn no ho suro nnyi ha; na me yer ntsi woboku me."
na nnyɛ me na ba bi a; na ɔbɛyɛɛ me yer."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Nyankopɔn maa mifii m'egya fie mikekyinii no
column4: Ayamuyie a fa yɛ me nye yi; beebiara mbrɛ yebodu no
column5: ka no wɔ mo ho dɛ

column7: na ɔdze ne yer Sara sanee maa no."

column4: m'asaase na ɔwɔ w'enyim yi: tsena beebiara mbrɛ woara epɛ."

column5: mama wo nua ndwetɛbona apem: hwɛ
column6: ɔyɛ nkataenyim dze ma wo wɔ hɔn a wɔka wo ho nyinara hɔn mu; na enya dza ɔtsen wɔ nyimpa nyinara hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na Abraham sɔree maa Nyankopɔn: na Nyankopɔn yɛɛ Abimelek nye ne yer
column3: nye no mfonabaa edur; na wɔwowoo mba."

column2: "Osiandɛ nna EWURADZE esiw Abimelek ne fie yafun nyinara mu kwan petsee wɔ Abraham ne yer Sara ntsi."
